column5: Awesome ride man...congrats
Hahaha.  I would be afraid to go that fast on water  Got it last night washed it tonight wax it in the morning.     Then fish until work Tuesday lol
Rolly look for us fishing in front of deet brook if you are on LSC
Will do. I'm heading there monday
Nice. We will call you Bumble Bee!!!
Nice Rolly, congrats!
Just wante to say thank you to all the members who gave me advice on buying a boat. I may of went a bit over my budget but I found the boat of my dreams.
nice  now I have to kick myself for selling my nitro
Nice rig!
Nice ride!!!!!!
Great looking boat congrats
looks like a rocket!
SWEET RIDE!!!!!
Sweet ride!  Who's the short guy that sits in that bow seat.
Where do you mount the downriggers?
Wow! that looks like a rocket!!!  Congrats!!
If that's not the dream boat of anyone then they have another thing coming!
Nice!! Not practical for my kind of fishing but an awesome looking rig otherwise.
Congrats Rolly, I'm glad the day has finally come for ya!
Damn rolly nice but where will I put the down Easters? Maybe this will be the summer we hook up lol
Very nice. I like the 3 seats across option. Bet she moves along nice:good:
Thanks guys. I'm pretty jacked. I'm sitting at work right now completely regretting coming in lol  No Down riggers  on this one. That's what the other boats for lol
Very nice.  Whats pushing that ride?
gonna have to get the boats out for a mini tournament there Rolly. Looks nice.  someone asked about the bow seat being short, if you've met Rolly you would understand LMAO..............JK Rolly
Very nice indeed Rolly !!
Sweet
Sharp looking boat. It looks fast sitting on the trailer!
It IS fast on the trailer....140KPH at times even.  Nice boat.
well then lets hope the boat never passes the truck that it's been tailgating at those speeds
Nice Ride Rolly !!!! Congrats.
